Knucklebones
Knucklebones Rules
1. The game is played between two players on separate boards with 3 columns each.
 2. Players take turns rolling a dice and placing it in one of their columns.
 3. The score of each column is the sum of all dice placed in that column.
 4. Matching dice (same number) in the same column double their value.
 5. If a player places a dice in a column that matches a dice on the opponent's side in the same column, the opponent's dice is removed.
 6. The game ends when one player fills all 3 of their columns with dice.
 7. The player with the highest total score across all columns wins the game.
